text: Anna Verouli (, born November 13, 1956) is a retired Greek javelin thrower. She was born in Kavala. She won the gold medal at the 1982 European Athletics Championships, and a bronze medal at the 1983 World Championships in Athletics. Verouli was tested positive for nandrolone at the 1984 Summer Olympics and was banned from the competition.Olympic doping's list of shame.
